title: La-Mulana 2
notes: The game starts and runs fine. But no keyboard or controller support at all.

Game displayed black screen then crashed on first run, but ran perfectly on the second attempt without any tweaking. Keyboard controls are functional, but game does not properly detect Xbox 360 controller.
